entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his love of magical creatures. He is described as proudly making Hermione go a brilliant shade of magenta.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is known for her exceptional magical abilities. She is described as being made to go a brilliant shade of magenta by Hagrid.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is a pure-blood wizard who is struggling with magic. He is mentioned as an example of someone who doesn't have to be a good wizard just because they are pure-blood.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts and is known for his loyalty and bravery. He is described as wiping his sweaty brow with a shaking hand.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is the father of Draco Malfoy and is a pure-blood wizard. He is mentioned as someone who would come marching up to school if Ron had cursed his son.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is the son of Lucius Malfoy and is a Slytherin student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as someone who would be in trouble if Ron had cursed him.

relationships.description: Hagrid makes Hermione go a brilliant shade of magenta.
